Posts.Content: Mar 23, 2015 05:48AM - edited Mar 23, 2015 07:02AM by tasha30815 My nurse practitioner recommended Vitamin D, Evening Primrose Oil and Vitamin E. I also take Iodoral (and iodine supplement-you can also try Lugol's).  Please research iodine deficiency and how it affects our thyroid and breast health by causing cysts (you can also read reviews on Amazon). I also take a liquid multivamin (Nature's Plus Source of Life) I also take liquid Chlorophyll ES and Sovereign Silver (colloidal silver). I also take Epsom Salts baths at least twice a week (for magnesium and to draw out toxins). I also take melatonin before bed. Another big change that I've made recently is to stop using antiperspirants and purchase only paraben and aluminum free deodorants.  The great thing is that the Chlorophyll I take is also an internal deodorant so I have no issues with body odor anyway.

Posts.Content: tasha30815 wrote: My mother is in almost constant pain.  Yesterday she tried to go to church, but the pain was so bad that she had to go back into the house.  She has tried patches and numerous different kinds of medications and nothing seems to be working.  I hate seeing her like this.  I asked about a pain pump, but they are unwilling to give her one unless she is on hospice.  Is that the norm? The oral medications are not working well at all.  I will take any recommendations you have.  My heart is breaking, I just want to help her. Thanks! Log in to post a reply
